DOC.brief_summary: A clinical study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of MK0633 in adult patients with chronic asthma.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of MK0633 in Patients With Chronic Asthma (0633-007)
DOC.criteria: Documented clinical history of symptoms of chronic asthma, including dyspnea, wheezing, chest tightness, cough, and/or sputum production Males and females 1870 years of age History of kidney or chronic liver disease Recent history of heart problems within the past 3 months Evidence of another clinically significant, active lung disorder such as bronchiectasis or COPD
